msg.msgText:
A "Queue" composite object can be updated using the "update" option of the "imaserver" command.
SYNTAX: imaserver update Queue help imaserver update Queue "Name=value" "Item=value" ...
EXAMPLE: imaserver update Queue "Name=Queue1" "AllowSend=True"
Configuration items for "Queue" object:

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
